tweets.author: ByteRamble

tweets.content:
ğŸš¨A large-scale macOS attack software macOS-hVNC appears on the dark webğŸš¨

Mac computers and devices are widely used by cryptocurrency individuals and small and medium-sized enterprises because of their better security and usability, but recently a software macOS-hVNC for large-scale attacks on #macOS has appeared on the dark web.

1âƒ£Stealthy operation: hVNC is designed to run in stealth mode, making it difficult for individuals and SMBs to detect its presence on their systems, this stealthy operation allows cybercriminals to maintain access without arousing suspicion.
2âƒ£Persistence Permission: hVNC typically includes mechanisms to ensure that it remains active even after a system reboot or attempts to remove it.
3âƒ£Data Theft: The main purpose of hVNC is to steal sensitive information such as login credentials, personal data, virtual assets, financial information or other valuable data from computers of individuals, employees.
4âƒ£Remote Control: hVNC allows cybercriminals to remotely control computers, giving them full access to the system.

While Macs have historically been less of a target for cybercriminals, attackers are now developing more macOS malware, so be aware of the risks.
